conbody.p: You must install the Rabbit MQ Message Bridge version 3.6.8 on the server node to access the real-time updates on the applications in the

GE recommends that you configure the message bridge in the Server before installing the Universal Client. If you would like to configure RabbitMQ later, it is recommended that you provide the host name and the user credentials in the Plant Applications Universal Client Docker wizard.
For information on installing the message bridge, see .
